content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.93, 10.71)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group (position 12.93, 10.71) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.WORKING
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(2.0, 2.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS

### Lab at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO_POWER

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access non-existent entities
- Ensure the entity you are trying to access exists at the specified position. For example, the error occurred when attempting to get the lab at position (6.0, 0.0), which does not have a lab entity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all electric entities are properly connected to the electric network to avoid the NO_POWER status.
